reviewText:
This 5-Disc Set is basically these two sets combined into one package along with the "Life in the Cage" documentary on the 5th disc:
King of the Cage: The Fighters of Las Vegas Mixed Martial Arts
King of the Cage: The Fighters of Japan Mixed Martial Arts

If the price is right it is the one to get instead of the other 2 sets. Fights are as to be expected... good but not on the level of the UFC or Pride at the time.

Over the 4 fight discs there are a few of the fights which are the same for some reason!!

There are a few good fights on here, but there are much better KOTC dvds around than this one.
